name: Drinking Up Apple: Wassailing Day
description: At the core (heh) of this, is the hot wassail, a spiced drink that falls somewhere between cider, punch and mulled wine (each village has their own recipe, some with dry sherry or beer).
recipeIngredient: Juice of an orange or tangerine
1/2 teaspoon cloves, nutmeg and any other like-minded spice

recipeInstructions.text: Bring liquids to a boil, then add spices and serve!
